text:
Since Jasper is the RI for JSP 1.2, I think it's a requirement that it supports 
the "jsp:id" attribute for all elements in the JSP View used by TLVs. The #1
issue with JSP is poor error reporting, and it's sad to see that the RI doesn't
even use all tools available to improve the situation.
creator: hans@gefionsoftware.com

text: The "jsp:id" attribute is supported by Jasper2.
creator: jan.luehe@sun.com
markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 3668 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
